Class SeatFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • SeatFinder

  • public class SeatFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Seat Finder has One main point in this Reservation System. It is to as the name says, to find Seats that are requested from the available seats data structure.
    Since:
    2/18/2017
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mebin Skaria

    • Method Detail

      • economyFinder

        public java.lang.String economyFinder(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> available,
                                      java.lang.String pref)
        Function finds a seat in the Economy class, or returns a blank string if no seats were found.
        Parameters:
        available - The available seats data structure.
        pref - The Preference of Seat [W]indow,[C]enter,[A]isle.
        Returns:
        String that is a seat key from the requested preference.

      • firstFinder

        public java.lang.String firstFinder(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> available,
                                    java.lang.String pref)
        Function finds a seat in the First class, or returns a blank string if no seats were found.
        Parameters:
        available - The available seats data structure.
        pref - The Preference of Seat [W]indow,[C]enter,[A]isle.
        Returns:
        String that is a seat key from the requested preference.

      • getAvailableFirstSeats

        public int getAvailableFirstSeats(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> available)
        Gets the total amount of seats in First Class
        Parameters:
        available - Available seats data structure.
        Returns:
        Total amount of seats free in the First class.

      • getAvailableEconomySeats

        public int getAvailableEconomySeats(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> available)
        Gets the total amount of seats in Economy Class
        Parameters:
        available - Available seats data structure.
        Returns:
        Total amount of seats free in the Economy class.

      • findGroupSeats

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> findGroupSeats(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> available,
                                                            int amountOfPeople,
                                                            boolean first)
        Parameters:
        available - Available Seats data structure.
        amountOfPeople - The amount of seats the function is asked to find.
        first - If the function should look in first or economy.
        Returns:
        All the seat keys for the amount of people requested or an empty arrayList if request was not complete.

      • adjacentSeatsInRow

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> adjacentSeatsInRow(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> list,
                                                                int row)
        Looks at row and find thes largest amount of adjacent seats together.
        Parameters:
        list - Available Seats data structure.
        row - The row looked at
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Strings that hold seat keys of the adjacent seats.
